name: Dr. Scienceman in RELATIVITY
description:
Made for the 'GamesPlusJam', Theme was 'Time'

Join Dr. Scienceman on an adventure of a rather short time. Fight off evil aliens using the power of Special Relativity! Your knowledge of Special Relativity allows you to experience time more slowly the faster that you move. Use this to your advantage!

WASD to move.

Mouse to aim & shoot.

F to use workbenches.
